titleStmt.title: A letter sent from the Kings Majestie to the Lords of his Privie Covncell of the Kingdome of Scotland
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

notesStmt.note: At end: "Given at our Court at Yorke the 20. of May 1642."
Reproduction of original in: National Library of Scotland.
